reference.title: Engine Low Power and Irregular Running at Low Speeds
reference.shortdesc: Common conditions that can cause the engine to run with reduced power or irregularly at low speeds.

ul.li: Poor compression due to leaky valves
Incorrect spark plug gap (too close between points)
Excessive clearance between valve stem and push rod

section.title: Component Relationships
section.note:
Multiple conditions may be present simultaneously. For example:
Valve issues can affect both compression and mechanical operation
Ignition problems may compound fuel mixture issues
